name: Do Game Dev Is Hard?
description:
• Project done over the course of my game developer training (Interface 3)

This is a game done in JavaScript, using the Phaser 3 framework.

It's my first time coding and creating a game with JavaScript.

It's a point-and-click game where you pretend to be a game developer who has to get rid of bugs as fast as they can in order for their program not to crash.

You have 30 seconds to destroy the error windows (implying you fixed a bug).

100% inspired by real-life experience :P
